meanings.definition: Not able to be compared or measured in the same terms
meanings.sent1: The difference in size between the two objects was incommensurably vast.
meanings.sent2: The complexity of the situation made it incommensurably difficult to understand.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit a square peg into a round hole was incommensurably amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was incommensurably deep, like an ocean with no end.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak stood incommensurably tall against the clear blue sky.

meanings.definition: To an immeasurable or infinite degree
meanings.sent1: His kindness towards others was incommensurably generous.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the night sky shone incommensurably bright.
meanings.sent3: The speed of the car was incommensurably fast, like a lightning bolt.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed incommensurably loud through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was incommensurably breathtaking, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
